feed.title: Criminal complaints against "network disruption as a service" startups

entry.title: Criminal complaints against "network disruption as a service" startups
entry.summary: The conversation revolves around the definition of a node in a network and the behavior of certain clients. The speaker clarifies that they are not referring to keeping logs, but rather pretending to be a network peer without relaying transactions. This includes all Simplified Payment Verification (SPV) clients. The listener acknowledges the tricky nature of the situation.
